Items.Title: Oversight - Finding a Cure:  Examining Law Enforcement efforts to remedy the Prescription Drug Abuse Epidemic.
Items.ActionText: This Oversight was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Oversight - Finding a Cure:  Examining Law Enforcement efforts to remedy the Prescription Drug Abuse Epidemic.

Items.Title: Resolution calling upon the New York State Assembly to pass and the Governor to sign into law S.5260-C/A.7251-C, which would amend the Penal Law to establish the offense of fraudulent prescription, dispensing and procurement of non-controlled substance prescription medications and devices, and the offense of unlawful possession of non-controlled substance prescription medications and devices.
Items.ActionName: Hearing on P-C Item by Comm
Items.ActionText: This Resolution was Hearing on P-C Item by Comm
Items.MatterName: Establish the offense of fraudulent prescription, dispensing and procurement of non-controlled substance prescription medications and devices. (S.5260-C/A.7251-C)

Items.Title: Oversight - Finding a Cure:  Examining Law Enforcement efforts to remedy the Prescription Drug Abuse Epidemic.
Items.ActionText: This Oversight was Filed, by Committee
Items.MatterName: Oversight - Finding a Cure:  Examining Law Enforcement efforts to remedy the Prescription Drug Abuse Epidemic.

Items.Title: Resolution calling upon the New York State Assembly to pass and the Governor to sign into law S.5260-C/A.7251-C, which would amend the Penal Law to establish the offense of fraudulent prescription, dispensing and procurement of non-controlled substance prescription medications and devices, and the offense of unlawful possession of non-controlled substance prescription medications and devices.
Items.ActionName: P-C Item Laid Over by Comm
Items.ActionText: This Resolution was P-C Item Laid Over by Comm
Items.MatterName: Establish the offense of fraudulent prescription, dispensing and procurement of non-controlled substance prescription medications and devices. (S.5260-C/A.7251-C)
